mapper.select:
SELECT CVE.ID, CVE.DESCRIPTION, CVE.PUBLISHED_DATE, CVE.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, VUL.VULN_LIBRARY_INFO, VUL.LAST_UPDATED AS LIBRARY_MAPPING_DATE FROM TB_CVE_DATA AS CVE LEFT JOIN TB_VULN_LIBRARY AS VUL ON VUL.VULN_SOURCE_CD = 'CVE' AND CVE.ID = VUL.REF_ID
CVE.ID = #{param.keyword}
ORDER BY
CVE.ID
CVE.PUBLISHED_DATE
CVE.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
ASC
DESC
DESC
LIMIT #{param.start}, #{param.length}
